text: @ByMikeBaker @sherifink Lets not forget that trump called the coronavirus, a "Hoax by the democrats." He does not take anything serious. Everything is just a game to him. Sitting in the WH is just a game to him. The lives and well-being of the American people is not something he gives a damn about. Nada
